name: Vintage Flashlight
description:
Kyle Vonhipsters Vintage Flashlight is a 2D Puzzle Platformer where your source of light could be your source of plight... um yeah posting this last minute does not leave time for a good description. But you know you want to play it!

Play it before everyone else does while its still cool!

Controls:
Move: WASD
Jump: SPACE
Torch Angle : Mouse
